txt.en:
News has come to us from Stangard, and your presence is urgently requested. Make haste to the north-eastern gate of the city, and speak to Sabert, the gate guard, when you arrive. Sabert has information for you.

Wise would it be to refrain from openly discussing your contributions to us. Your help has been appreciated, but there are men in power who would curse you for your intervention.

Penda
